text: @ericswalwell @DevinCow I would say yes; but I don't lie. I would say yes; but my retirement has gone in the toilet. I would say yes; but @realDonaldTrump's weak, incompetent response to COVID-19 has cost tens of thousands of lives. I would say yes; but I'm so tired of unarmed black men being killed.
